meanings.definition: Small pieces of dry dog food.
meanings.sent1: My dog loves to eat kibbles for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The kibbles in the bowl were almost gone.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled kibbles all over the floor!
meanings.sent4: The kibbles scattered on the ground like tiny pebbles.
meanings.sent5: The smell of kibbles filled the room, making me hungry.

meanings.definition: To grind or crush into small pieces.
meanings.sent1: I used a mortar and pestle to kibbles the spices.
meanings.sent2: The chef kibbles the nuts to sprinkle on the salad.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally kibbles the cookies into crumbs.
meanings.sent4: The machine kibbles the rocks into fine powder effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The blender loudly kibbles the ice into a slushy drink.

meanings.definition: To nibble or snack on small pieces of food.
meanings.sent1: She likes to kibbles on popcorn while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: The kids kibbles on grapes during their playtime.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel cheekily kibbles on the birdseed from the feeder.
meanings.sent4: The rabbit quietly kibbles on the carrot in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The guests happily kibbles on the appetizers at the party.
